alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:37PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Houston, northeastern Jackson, southwestern Early and northwestern Seminole Counties through 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/... At 737 PM EDT/637 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Ashford, or 9 miles east of Cottonwood. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Donalsonville, Ashford, Malone, Avon, Gordon, Jakin, Steam Mill, Saffold, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Howards Mill, Lovetown, Riverturn, Hornsville, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy, Farley Nuclear Plant and Cedar Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
